title: Van Heusen Men's Big and Tall Wrinkle Free Long Sleeve Button Down Shirt
description: Non Iron: wrinkle-resistant finish requires no additional ironing
Easy Care: Machine washable so you can wear it straight from the dryer
Features a single patch pocket on the chest
This classic long sleeve button down will give your look a timeless feel
Go wherever the day takes you in the Van Heusen wrinkle free shirt. A special finish and classic pattern ensure this long-sleeve style always looks polished, regardless of the activity.
